body.value:
The PCRC Data Informatics and Statistics Core (DISC) hosts a de-identified quantitative data repository (DiDR) of PCRC-supported and non-PCRC end-of-life and palliative care (EOLPC) research study data.

Anyone may request the quantitative data and download related study materials for secondary analysis.

Please use the buttons below to browse available studies in the DiDR and to view previous data requests. 

[button url="/studies" size="medium" color="blue"]Browse Studies[/button]
[button url="/requests" size="medium" color="green"]View Requests[/button]
 

To request data from the PCRC's De-identified repository please use the button below to submit the data request form.  

[center][button url="https://airtable.com/shrEtCq5FbpGUjDsU" target="_blank" size="medium" color="orange"]Data Request Form[/button][/center]

 

To donate EOLPC data from a closed study to the DiDR, please use the button below to submit the data deposit request form and then PCRC Data Manager will be in contact.

[center][button url="https://airtable.com/shr35qSMIQKp6L7wB" target="_blank" size="medium" color="blue"]Data Deposit Request Form[/button][/center]

 

Please contact us for any additional questions related to the DiDR.
